message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll find it's a great opportunity. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand you're working with a budget, Bob. However, I've had other interested parties looking at this product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $16000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $14000. That's the highest I can go.

I appreciate your honesty, Bob. However, I'm still not convinced that $14000 is the best value for this product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $16500.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your target price, but I'm still not willing to go that high. I'm willing to meet you at $14500, but that's as high as I can go. I'm starting to get a bit concerned that I might be able to find a better deal elsewhere.

I understand your concerns, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up on the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $17000, but that's as low as I can go.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, and I'm not sure I'm willing to go any higher. I'm willing to meet you at $15000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to look elsewhere.

I understand your frustration, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up on the price. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to get as close to my target price as possible. I'm willing to sell it to you for $16250, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm afraid I've reached my limit, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $15000, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm afraid I'll have to look elsewhere.
